about_the_game:
Behold the superman, superpigeon, superpostman! And yeah, he can never have enough "super". He is a real superguy! Long time ago when he was a little kid he found his true calling. He delivers parcels at the speed of light anywhere in the world! But not exactly at the speed of light, because he isn't a very good pilot. And anywhere in the world means that no one knows where exactly. His internal navigator sometimes fails. Nevertheless, he is a true superguy! Together you'll visit a zillion town squares where you can always have a little snack. Moreover, his super animated dices will help you return to the right path instead of finding yourself on another town square. Don't forget about 100 gold and 50,000 chips.

After buying this content "Wild bird" character and "Wild bird's” dices will be added to your collection as well as 100 gold and 50,000 chips to your account.
